name: kNERD
tag_list: music, playlist, band-manager, music-community, fan-mail, music-portal
overview:
kNERD is a tool that connects music industry together with fans. It creates an open community with real world artist/fan information.

Fans: Discover, listen to and review new music. See how all your favorite artists are connected to each other. create and share playlists. Rate and comment on other members reviews. Receive realtime updates from your favorite band members.

Artists: Manage all of your present and past music projects. See what cities your fans live in, what songs they like the best and what they actually think of your music. See how you are connected to the rest of the music industry. Connect with new artists.

Everyone In The Music Industry: Share playlists of everything you have ever worked on and share it on other sites, use kNERD as your live resume. Connect with new artists and reconnect with artists you have worked with.

-New simplified interface
-One click music uploading
-3x faster load time
-Sync with facebook, tumblr, twitter and more!
-New music player.

kNERD beta 2 launches!
